cols.h5EnDetail:
One. Product Description

1. This product is a Netflix official regular gift card subscription member account, this account uses a shared parking space, which does not affect normal use, mind not shooting.

2. After purchase, you will be given an account number, password and location, please take a seat according to the location.

3. Support global use, Hong Kong and other regions can be used normally.

4. Due to the particularity of the member account, refunds cannot be supported for any reason after the sale, and if you cannot log in for other reasons such as password error, please contact customer service to ensure that any problems are solved. Please do not modify any PIN or other settings after logging in, as violators will be disqualified. Thank you for your understanding and support, and I wish you a happy movie!

Two. Directions for use

What is an account and what is a parking space.

Netflix's premium account supports 5 independent sub-accounts at the same time without interfering with each other, and Netflix launched this feature to lease these 5 sub-accounts to different people to share the subscription cost of the account. Then the owner of the account is called "car owner", and the 5 sub-accounts are called "5 parking spaces"

1. Please subscribe to the corresponding [parking space], the serial number of the parking space will be sent when the goods are delivered, and the parking space number will be matched according to the following figure, remember not to sit in the pit.

2. The video needs to open its own ladder, and the source of the film in which region the agent is will be displayed, and the agent's own platform does not provide it.

3. There is a risk in the network route, Netflix will prohibit entry, and a pwd error will be prompted, please change the route.

4. Before switching, please turn off Netflix first. It is recommended that the United States, Japan, South Korea, Hong Kong and Taiwan If it doesn't work, please switch between these ones, and each switch can be done once.

5. If it can't be solved, it means that your ladder does not support streaming unlocking.

6. If you encounter problems with login or other problems, you can contact the customer service of the platform to solve them.

Three. Precautions

1. After payment, you can view the purchased account information on the page where the purchase is completed, or you can click the order center in the upper right corner to view and pick-up, and it will be automatically shipped within 24 hours.

2. Refunds for any reason are not supported after shipment.

3. Encounter the situation of not being able to log in normally:

The APP side can be operated to reinstall or update the APP of Nafi, wifi to change the data network, please restart the device and then reopen the login,

You can clear the cache on the browser side and visit this link: netflix.com/clearcookies

Some friends can log in using the network of micropn, or you can try to update the network subscription of Panwall micropn, change the IP of different regions, please restart the device and then reopen the login

(At present, the login system is very friendly to the native IP, and the native IP node in the more popular regions is switched, such as the United States, Singapore, Hong Kong, Taiwan, Japan, Canada, Australia, and Europe)
